buildRadius.classic: Specifies the radius of the build area around the beacon. -1 indicates there is no radius
buildRadius.koth: Specifies the radius of the overtime area around the beacon.
buildRadius.ad: Specifies the radius of the build area around the beacon. -1 indicates there is no radius

buildHeight.classic: Specifies the number of blocks above the beacon at which the player can build.
buildHeight.koth: Specifies the number of blocks above the beacon at which the player can build.
buildHeight.ad: Specifies the number of blocks above the beacon at which the player can build.
